controllers.authController.js: Handles user authentication, sign up, and login logic.
controllers.postController.js: Manages creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting blog posts.
controllers.commentController.js: Manages operations related to comments on posts.

middlewares.authMiddleware.js: Middleware for checking user authentication and permissions.

models.userModel.js: Defines the user schema for the database.
models.postModel.js: Defines the blog post schema for the database.
models.commentModel.js: Defines the comment schema for the database.

routes.authRoutes.js: Routes related to authentication (login, logout, sign up).
routes.postRoutes.js: Routes for blog post operations (CRUD operations).
routes.commentRoutes.js: Routes for managing comments on blog posts.

services.authService.js: Business logic for authentication, such as password hashing and verification.

utils.database.js: Utility for database connection and management.
